channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Heritage's antisemitism task force breaks off from foundation, will also probe right-wing threats
item.description: The Heritage Foundation's antisemitism task force has split off from the institution "for a season," exiting the conservative think-tank as its member...

item.title: Will Polls Keep Showing Less Support For Queer Policies As Zoomers Age?
item.description: New polling offers a growing opportunity for Christians to present God’s natural order as good and Christ’s offer of salvation as necessary.

item.title: Longest Shutdown Ever Reveals U.S. Could Stand To Fire A Lot Of Federal Workers
item.description: One thing the shutdown seems to show is that there may very well be quite a few federal employees America could do without.

item.title: Nancy Mace’s ex claims she fabricated sexual assault allegations in plot with friend’s estranged wife: report
item.description: Patrick Bryant filed a lawsuit claiming Rep. Nancy Mace fabricated sexual assault allegations against him with help from a mutual acquaintance's wife.

item.title: U.S. strikes another alleged drug vessel, killing three
item.description: The U.S. military struck another alleged drug trafficking boat in the Caribbean Thursday, killing three people, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said.

item.title: Rep. Elise Stefanik announces campaign for New York governor
item.description: Republican Rep. Elise Stefanik has launched her bid for governor of New York, challenging Democratic incumbent Gov. Kathy Hochul.

item.title: Pelosi Was Bad. What Follows Could Be Worse
item.description: The San Francisco progressive was the most effective Democratic legislator since LBJ.

item.title: Trump ‘failed to consider the harms’ on SNAP benefits by withholding food aid during shutdown, judge rules
item.description: Find the money to fully fund SNAP benefits for November, the judge told the White House, which promptly appealed.

item.title: NR Is My Debate Training

item.title: ‘You can’t expect people to go in to work when they’re not getting a paycheck’: Travelers sympathize despite 800 downed Friday flights
item.description: The 40 airports selected for the slowdown span over two dozen states and include hubs such as Atlanta, Dallas, Denver, LA and Charlotte.

item.title: ‘They ain’t worried about the miners or people in West Virginia or coal miners anywhere’: Black lung sufferers despair over DC’s distance
